mainText:
I never met Steve but I have owned Apple products since I bought my first Apple II.I've had and loved them all.
Steve revolutionized computing, music, phones, digital capture and digital cinema cameras.
Thanks for all you have given to me, my family, my life, my work and the world.
The world was, is and will be a better place because of Steve Jobs.
My heart goes out to his wife and children in this time of sadness.You were a true genius.
Thanks!
author: Henry
